projectDescription: Your one stop shop for NFTs. A community first platform for creators and collectors.

eligibilityCriteria.description: ATOM, XPRT, LUNA, CMDX, JUNO, STARS stakers

claimActions.description: Stake ATOM, XPRT, LUNA, CMDX, JUNO or STARS. Then enter your wallet addresses on the proect's dashboard to confirm participation. Send a magic transaction and then asnwer daily quiz to claim tokens.
For eligibile Osmosis Liquidity Providers. Claim, stake, vote on a governance proposal and create a social profile to unlock your airdrop.
